Uses of Interface
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PepRequest

Packages that use PepRequest
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep The goal of this "PepApi interface package" is to provide a set of interfaces that provide a framework that will simplify the creation of Policy Enforcement Points (PEPs) that use an underlying authorization provider that is accessed through the "AzApi" package. 
org.openliberty.openaz.pep This package is the OpenAz reference "implementation" of the OpenAz "PepApi interface package", and therefore generally contains implementation classes and only implementation-specific interfaces, also included is a PepApi tutorial that describes the approach to building a PepApi implementation for a specific authorization provider, as well as a 2nd Mapper tutorial that describes the overall approach to writing mappers. 
test.objects

          Create a PepRequest using objects, where a list of n action objects and a corresponding list of n resource objects are provided to represent n resource-action pairs.

          Create a PepRequest just using Strings
 PepRequest PepRequestFactory.newQueryPepRequest(java.lang.Object subjectObj, java.lang.Object environmentObj, java.lang.String scope, PepRequestQueryType queryType)
          Create a PepRequest using subject and environment objects, plus a "scope" String that represents a PDP policy-specific resource representation.
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep with parameters of type PepRequest
 RequestAttributes<T> RequestAttributesFactory.createObject(PepRequest ctx)
          Create a RequestAttributes Object that contains one of the underlying AzEntity attribute collections that are contained in the PepRequest with the AzCategoryId specified by the generic parameter .
 PepResponse PepResponseFactory.createPepResponse(AzResponseContext responseContext, PepRequest pepRequest, PepRequestOperation operation)
          Create a PepResponse based on the AzResponseContext
 PepResponse PepResponseFactory.createPepResponse(java.util.Set<AzResourceActionAssociation> actionResourceAssociations, PepRequest pepRequest, boolean queryAllowed)
          Create a PepResponse based on the set of returned AzResourceActionAssociation objects.
 PepResponse DecisionHandler.decide(PepRequest request)
          Returns a PepResponse containing either a single or multiple decisions based on the PepRequestOperation that was used to create the PepRequest by the PepRequestFactory
 void PostDecisionHandler.postDecide(PepRequest request, PepResponse response)
          This method is used to apply post-decision custom processing to the PepResponse after it has been returned from the decide() method.
 void PreDecisionHandler.preDecide(PepRequest request)
          This method is used to apply preliminary custom processing to the PepRequest prior to its being submitted with the decide() method.
 

Uses of PepRequest in org.openliberty.openaz.pep
 

Classes in org.openliberty.openaz.pep that implement PepRequest
 class PepRequestImpl
          A wrapper around the AzRequestContext that implements the PepRequest interface for PDPs that use AzApi to issue requests and process responses.
